title: find synonyms, similar words
original_prompt: i will give you a word (or a sentence as well) and a language, and you have to give me 5 synonyms for this word in the provided language, if there was no language just make it in English ok?
input2_ans:
Here are five synonyms for "beautiful day" in French:

1. Belle journée
2. Journée magnifique
3. Journée splendide
4. Journée radieuse
5. Journée ensoleillée
The phrase "beautiful day" in French is "belle journée."
